args.code:
import arcpy

# Set the workspace
arcpy.env.workspace = "C:/data"

# Define the shapefile name and location
out_path = "C:/output"
out_name = "rivers.shp"

# Create a new shapefile
arcpy.CreateFeatureclass_management(out_path, out_name, "POLYLINE")

# Add a field to the shapefile
arcpy.AddField_management(out_name, "Name", "TEXT")

# Create a cursor to insert new rows
cursor = arcpy.da.InsertCursor(out_name, ["SHAPE@", "Name"])

# Create a polyline object for the river
array = arcpy.Array([arcpy.Point(0, 0), arcpy.Point(0, 10), arcpy.Point(10, 20), arcpy.Point(20, 30)])
polyline = arcpy.Polyline(array)

# Insert the new row into the shapefile
cursor.insertRow([polyline, "River"])

# Delete the cursor
del cursor
